name: Bob Ross Adventure
description:
LD41 - Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

# Bob Ross Paintings Adventure  

Join Bob and its brushes in a colorful adventure!  

X, C, V            -> Switch between brushes!  
Mouse Click -> Paint  
SPACE           -> Restart a level  

-----
## Information
Shortcut AZERTY/QWERTY friendly!  
Genres: Platformer + Painting  

If you have trouble passing a level, you can press [P] to skip it.  

-----
## Developed in Godot 3.0

⚠️ HTML version: Firefox Quantum (last version) support. Google Chrome may not support it (depends on computer). Please try Windows/Mac/Linux version (coming soon)  

### If there is any bug that prevent playing, please let me know!

Please leave a comment with your feedback :smile: This will allow me to improve my next participation!!
